comments.body: Why throw here? Isn't this an expected case?
I wanted to avoid duplicating the log message on line 248
1000 days is overkill, 1 day is consistent with the other workers

In general if this returns and the executor hasn't terminated, we have leaked some threads.  I agree one day should be enough to shut down, but if we actually hit that timeout, there is another bug we have to fix.
